1.12.2.0.1.3:
=Fixed rendering of transparent slabs (partially)
=Fixed slab placement bugs
=Fixed crashes
1.12.2.0.1.2:
=Fixed an issue with crashes occurring when a slab does not have a variant property
=Added an extra precaution to when getting the pick block from a double slab to reduce the possibility of a null pointer error
1.12.2.0.1.1: =Fixed an issue with blocks which use the HALF block state property as the variant property as a slab and the blacklist (mainly causing an issue with Blockcraftery)
1.12.2.0.1.0: +Added a config file which contains a list of block states to not allow the placement of mixed slabs with the specified slab types
1.12.2.0.0.3:
=Fixed an issue with the mod crashing when on a server
=Fixed an issue with double slabs not working with other mods
+Added a forge update checker to notify players when a update has arrived
1.12.2.0.0.2: =Fixed a bug to do with moving a double slab with a piston using the Quark Pistons move TE feature (Note: there is still an issue with the rendering of the double slab when the piston is moving but this will be fixed as soon as possible)
1.12.2.0.0.1:
+Added the ability to create double slabs using different slab types
+Added WAILA/HWYLA support to show the correct slab

1.14.4.1.0.1:
=Fixed a bug with regular slab placement
=Fixed the particle effects for double slabs
1.14.4.1.0.2:
=Fixed rendering of transparent slabs (partially)
=Fixed slab placement bugs
=Fixed crashes

1.15.2.2.0.2:
=Fixed rendering of transparent slabs (partially)
=Fixed slab placement bugs
=Fixed crashes
